title: Rewrite tinycc in MoonBit
description: Rewrite tinycc in MoonBit; arm64 backend only; target macOS Mach-O; compiler-only (emit .o).

title: MoonBit lexer+preprocessor
description: Implement tokenization and C preprocessor (macros, includes, conditional compilation) in MoonBit, based on refs/tinycc/tccpp.c and tcctok.h.

title: MoonBit parser+types+sem
description: Implement C parser, types, and semantic analysis in MoonBit (AST, symbol tables, type checking) based on refs/tinycc/tccgen.c.

title: MoonBit arm64 codegen
description: Implement arm64 code generation in MoonBit (instruction selection, register allocation), based on refs/tinycc/arm64-gen.c.

title: MoonBit Mach-O writer
description: Implement Mach-O writer for arm64 object files in MoonBit, based on refs/tinycc/tccmacho.c.

title: MoonBit CLI/build integration
description: Implement CLI flags and build integration for compiler pipeline (preprocess/compile to .o).

title: Use clap.mbt for cli args; See: https://github.com/TheWaWaR/clap.mbt
Preprocessor directives and macro expansion
description: Implement #define/#undef macros, conditional compilation (#if/#ifdef/#ifndef/#elif/#endif), and #include handling, using lexer line_start for directive detection. Base behavior on refs/tinycc/tccpp.c.
